import React, { useState } from 'react' import Signup from '../pages/Signup'; import ShowPassword from 'showpassword'; const SignupForm =()=> { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName:"", lastname:"", email:"", password:"", confirmPassword:"", }) const [showPassword, setShowPassword ]= useState(false); function changeHandler(event) { setFormData( ( prevData)=( { ...prevData [event.target.name] .event.target.value } )) } return (
{/*student-Instructor tab */}
